title: Meta is launching Horizon Worlds on web and mobile
content:
Meta is working on a web version of its virtual reality platform, Horizon Worlds. This news was revealed in a tweet by Meta CTO Andrew “Boz” Bosworth yesterday. Thanks to this, users will be able to join the metaverse without owning a Quest VR headset.

description: Meta is working on a web and mobile version of its virtual reality platform, Horizon Worlds - currently only available on VR headsets.
